她與男友看A片　驚見爺爺演出

日本現役AV界中有不少老當益壯的男優，體力精力過人。今年68歲、團塊世代出生的山田裕二，現在每個月仍有6、7片作品，接受訪問時透露平時的保養之道，以及當初出道時的家庭風暴。
山田裕二56歲進AV界，出道時家庭幸福美滿，有妻有女甚至有孫女。他一直瞞著家人拍AV好幾年，直到有一年，孫女與男朋友一起看A片，赫然發現，片中的人好眼熟……
後來，女兒有一天突然對他說：「在A片中看到了你喲……」最初他裝傻否認到底，但是女兒追問到底，因為片中禿頭的樣子和講話口音太像了，瞞也瞞不了，只好承認。山田裕二說：「這事傳到老婆耳裡時，她一度跟我鬧離婚，不過幸好最後還是原諒了我。她這樣愛我，我超級感激的。」
出道12年的山田裕二，每次演出，高潮時刻一定來真的，他說受不了用演的，為了拍片需要，特別重視平日的保養。像是維持每5天至少射精一次的習慣，尤其攝影前，更會好好的射精一次。他說定期射精是必要的，這樣下次才不會有困難。如果不射精的時候，每天也要勃起才行。
另外，他喜歡吃納豆、秋葵、洋蔥、大蒜等，以及含有鋅的保健品保養身體，也保持打球等運動習慣，有時間的話，就健行1、2小時。但是他也強調，上了年紀的人，運動絕不能過份勉強，從一點點開始做起，量力而為比較好。

Napoli midfielder Jorginho has hinted he would like to play in a side who play football like Jurgen Klopp's Liverpool.

The Italian international has been linked with a move to Liverpool, with suggestions the club have identified him as a possible summer target to bolster the midfield.

Although he did not name Liverpool by name, the Serie A star coyly admits the kind of football implemented at Anfield - as well as Manchester City, under Pep Guardiola - would be something he would enjoy.

"I think that I could fit (in the Premier League)," he told reporters. "It depends on who else is around me - I need players with the same characteristics that I have.

"There are English teams with this style of play, ball on the ground, quick transitions, high pressure.

"If one of those teams wanted me, I could fit and the other way round. My football way is not a usual one."

The German coach has instilled those qualities into his Liverpool side since taking charge in October 2015, and his side is renowned for their rapid counter attacks and devotion to pressing, much like Jorginho's current team.

So too, however, are City - and Guardiola has previously praised the 26-year-old, hailing him as 'marvellous' after a Champions League game between the two earlier this year.

Jorginho was flattered by the comments, but insists his focus for now remains on overhauling Juventus and delivering Napoli their first title since 1990.

"It's always nice to receive compliments, but it's spectacular when they come from a manager with that importance and winning past," Jorginho added.

"He's a global icon. All I can do is to be grateful. This is a consequence not just of my work but of all my team-mates in Napoli.

"I'm really keen to make history with Napoli and win the league."

Manchester United and Arsenal have also been linked with a move for the Brazilian-born star.

Source: Liverpool Echo

quote.msg:
Napoli midfielder Jorginho has hinted he would like to play in a side who play football like Jurgen Klopp's Liverpool.

The Italian international has been linked with a move to Liverpool, with suggestions the club have identified him as a possible summer target to bolster the midfield.

Although he did not name Liverpool by name, the Serie A star coyly admits the kind of football implemented at Anfield - as well as Manchester City, under Pep Guardiola - would be something he would enjoy.

"I think that I could fit (in the Premier League)," he told reporters. "It depends on who else is around me - I need players with the same characteristics that I have.

"There are English teams with this style of play, ball on the ground, quick transitions, high pressure.

"If one of those teams wanted me, I could fit and the other way round. My football way is not a usual one."

The German coach has instilled those qualities into his Liverpool side since taking charge in October 2015, and his side is renowned for their rapid counter attacks and devotion to pressing, much like Jorginho's current team.

So too, however, are City - and Guardiola has previously praised the 26-year-old, hailing him as 'marvellous' after a Champions League game between the two earlier this year.

Jorginho was flattered by the comments, but insists his focus for now remains on overhauling Juventus and delivering Napoli their first title since 1990.

"It's always nice to receive compliments, but it's spectacular when they come from a manager with that importance and winning past," Jorginho added.

"He's a global icon. All I can do is to be grateful. This is a consequence not just of my work but of all my team-mates in Napoli.

"I'm really keen to make history with Napoli and win the league."

Manchester United and Arsenal have also been linked with a move for the Brazilian-born star.

Source: Liverpool Echo
